
## vscode插件
# koroFileHeader
- 保存代码时自动添加头信息
> 设置setting.json
`
"fileheader.customMade": {
    "LastEditors": "Mark",
    "Description": "In User Settings Edit",
    "Author": "Mark",
    "Date": "Do not edit",
    "LastEditTime": "Do not edit"
  },
  "fileheader.configObj": {
    "autoAdd": true,
    "beforeAnnotation": {
      "sh": "#!/bin/bash"
    },
    "annotationStr": {
      "head": "/*",
      "middle": "* @",
      "end": " */",
      "use": true
    }
  },
`
# ESLint
- ESLint代码检测
> 
# Prettier
- 自动格式化代码
> 
# Path Intellisense
- 自动检测路径
